name: Spider-Man Name Generator
description: Feeling a bit...spidery? Unleash your inner web-slinger with our Spider-Man Name Generator! Get ready to crawl walls and crack jokes with a name that's truly amazing.
introduction: Ever wondered what your Spider-Verse alias would be? Stop dreaming and start generating! Whether you're a seasoned superhero or just starting your web-slinging journey, our generator will craft the perfect Spider-Man name that's uniquely YOU. Get ready to swing into action!
howToUse: 1. Stare intensely at a spider (optional, but highly encouraged for inspiration).
2. Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that doesn't shoot webs...usually).
3. Behold! Your brand-new, totally awesome Spider-Man name appears!
4. If you don't like it? Hit the button again, you'll get more choices!
5. Go forth and fight crime (or just look cool)! Don't forget to practice your one-liners.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually endorsed by Marvel?
faqs.answer: While we'd love to say yes (imagine the bragging rights!), this generator is purely for fun. No official Spidey stamp of approval here, just pure, unadulterated fan-made awesome.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my fan fiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go wild! We encourage creativity and web-slinging adventures. Just remember to credit us (kidding...mostly!).

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name the generator gives me?
faqs.answer: No problem! Just hit the 'Generate' button again. We've got enough name combinations to make even Doctor Octopus dizzy.

faqs.question: Will this generator give me spider powers?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. We're experts in names, not genetic engineering. You'll have to find your own radioactive spider for that. But hey, at least you'll have a cool name while you're waiting!

faqs.question: Are the names trademarked?
faqs.answer: Nope! The names generated are original and for creative use. You're free to use them for your own purposes without worrying about copyright issues.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for ways to improve! Feel free to send us your suggestions. If we like them, we might just add them to the generator!
